etymologies: early 18th century: from French, from Old French bandel, diminutive of bande (see band)

definitions: a narrow band worn around the head to hold the hair in position

examples.text: their dusty blonde hair smoothly combed in bandeaux

shortDefinitions: narrow band worn around head to hold hair in position

definitions: a woman's strapless top formed from a band of fabric fitting around the bust

examples.text: white two-piece bathing suit with quilted sateen bandeau top

shortDefinitions: woman's strapless top formed from band of fabric fitting around bust
